textContent:
The request from Ben to read him, Twas the night before Christmas. The eagerness to enjoy it, especially because it meant tapping into the child he has inside. 

Listening to Winston try to read Twas the night Before Christmas. Next year he will be reading all himself. 

The kid inside of Gil, building and then testing the hot wheel track for Winston's present. 

The twinge of knowing the magic will always be here but the genuine awe of a child will soon fade.

The awe is what must be kept alive. The awe is the joy of life.
title: Christmas Eve Reflections
textContentHtml:
The request from Ben to read him, Twas the night before Christmas. The eagerness to enjoy it, especially because it meant tapping into the child he has inside. 


Listening to Winston try to read Twas the night Before Christmas. Next year he will be reading all himself. 


The kid inside of Gil, building and then testing the hot wheel track for Winston's present. 


The twinge of knowing the magic will always be here but the genuine awe of a child will soon fade.


The awe is what must be kept alive. The awe is the joy of life.
